Tools that can help you create experiments at scale: 

 * [Empirica](https://empirica.ly/) (recommend)
 * [nodegame](https://nodegame.org/)
 * [otree](http://www.otree.org/): Python-based
 * [Lioness Lab](https://lioness-lab.org/) 
 * [BreadBoard](https://breadboard.yale.edu/): network
 * [Turktool](http://turktools.net/use/server.html): survey for Amazon Mturk
 * [Jspsych](https://www.jspsych.org/7.0/): JavaScript-based
 * [PsiTurk](https://psiturk.org/): Survey for Amazon Mturk
